Summary: Mastercard is holding a recruitment event on September 7, 2023 in Singapore for 3rd and 4th year Bachelor’s students graduating in 2024 and Master’s students with less than 1 year of prior working experience. The event will provide information about their 2024 Launch and internship programs, as well as opportunities in account management, product, and technology. The registration deadline is August 21, 2023 and interested individuals can register now. The event aims to showcase Mastercard's award-winning team culture and prioritize learning and growth for potential candidates.
